mapper.select: select tt.*,CONCAT(areaName,communityname) as areaNameAndCommunityName, CONCAT(areaname,communityname,detailAddress) as fullAddress from (SELECT t.id, t.area_id as areaId,t.community_id as communityId,t.open_id as openId, (select a.name from t_area a where a.id=t.area_id) as areaName, (select a.name from t_community a where a.id=t.community_id) as communityname, t.detail_address as detailAddress, t.user_name as userName, t.mobile_no as mobileNo FROM xfjy.t_user_address t where open_id=#{openId}) tt
